articles.author: Ellen Francis
articles.title: Europe strains to speak with one voice as U.S., Russia decide Ukraine’s fate - The Washington Post
articles.description: Cracks have emerged in the continent on how to keep arming Ukraine without U.S. money and how to respond to an increasingly tense confrontation with Russia.
articles.content:
BRUSSELS As Washington and Moscow engage in talks that could reshape Europes future, the continents leaders say their best bet is to stick together.
But first, they have to get on the same page.
